title: Why the hell are there so many AFKs?
body: Over the past couple of days I've probably had a dozen of remakes because of the afk players, my friend has the same problem, is anyone else getting so many afkers?

replies.body: Just a quick heads up, there have been some issues in patch 9.14 that have been causing problems for some players loading into games which may be causing a noticeably significant increase in AFK players. Important info regarding the issue, as well as steps for submitting logs, can be found in this thread just posted by Riot Gehirn: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/EAjcx13U-read-loading-screen-crashes
It's a bit bigger than that (given I was encountering the same bug in 9.13)  - but it is good that action is finally being taken on the issue.

Go to the Report a Bug page.  You will notice that there is a megathread started on the critical error bug that has been haunting the game since 9.13.  (It's only in 9.14 that it has suddenly become apparent.)  This bug either causes the game to get stuck at loading screen (which causes you to reboot your computer and you can't do the dump they request) or if you are lucky, it just stops the game programme from actually running.

[https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/u28PhgrF-patch-914-a-critical-error-has-occurred-report-megathread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/u28PhgrF-patch-914-a-critical-error-has-occurred-report-megathread)

Because they know they won't get punished. 
Despite being brought up time and time and time again, its defended and deemed "not punishable" even after constant reporting.
in my experiance you or someone els ints, feeds or trolls and then refuses to surrender so we afk the game and go play another one while we wait
